doc.title: Secrets of the Unknown
doc.plot: The known Edward Mulhare (Devon Miles in "The Knight Rider") presents this show about UFOs, ghosts, prophecies and other mysteries of the world. From Nostradamus until the Bermuda Triangle, from the witches until stonehenge, Mulhare, with his deep voice and his presency, takes to a trip for the unknown for to teach us what "there are something out there".
